H0.text: The multi-millionaire Hans Rausing made his fortune in what sort of industry . Food

H1.text: The multi-millionaire Hans Rausing made his fortune in what sort of industry . Manufacturing

H2.text: The multi-millionaire Hans Rausing made his fortune in what sort of industry . Dairy

H3.text: The multi-millionaire Hans Rausing made his fortune in what sort of industry . Packaged

A4.text: He made his fortune from his co-inheritance of Tetra Pak, a company founded by his father Ruben Rausing, and the largest food packaging company in the world.
